db:abstract.db:para: CategoryAxis places named ranges on the axis.

db:section.db:title: Detailed Description
db:section.db:para: This type can be used to explain the underlying data by adding labeled categories. The widths of the category ranges can be specified freely.

db:section.db:title: [read-only] categoriesLabels : StringList
db:section.db:para: The category labels as a list of strings.

db:section.db:title: labelsPosition : enumeration
db:section.db:para: The position of the category labels. The labels in the beginning and in the end of the axes may overlap other axes' labels when positioned on value.

db:td.db:para: Labels are positioned to the high end limit of the category.

db:section.db:title: startValue : int
db:section.db:para: The low end of the first category on the axis.

db:section.db:title: append(string label, real endValue)
db:section.db:para: Appends a new category to the axis with the label label. A category label has to be unique. endValue specifies the high end limit of the category. It has to be greater than the high end limit of the previous category. Otherwise the method returns without adding a new category.

db:section.db:title: remove(string label)
db:section.db:para: Removes a category specified by the label label from the axis.

db:section.db:title: replace(string oldLabel, string newLabel)
db:section.db:para: Replaces an existing category label specified by oldLabel with newLabel. If the old label does not exist, the method returns without making any changes.
